name: Warrior's Courage (V)
Lore: 'Each Rebel soldier is driven by bravery and a belief in the Rebel Alliance''s ideal of freedom. Courageous and quick-thinking Rebels often defeat Imperial legions.',
Text: 'Use 1 Force to deploy from Reserve Deck (or retrieve) Leia; reshuffle. OR If a battle just initiated, and non-[Reflections III] Leia is defending alone at a site, her forfeit cannot be reduced, she adds one destiny to power (+1 for each character and vehicle present), and draws one battle destiny if not able to otherwise. (Immune to Sense.)',
